preqs: Students must have passed BTB1010, BTG1200, BTW1200 or BTB1200 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BTB1010, BTG1200, BTP1010, BTW1200} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTC2210, BTC2213, BTF2220, BTG2220, BTW2213, BTW2220, LAW4171}

description: Topics include the Corporations Act scheme; the role and functions of the Australian Securities and Investments Commission; the concept of limited liability; the effect of registration; the corporate constitution; the company's relationship with outsiders; share and loan capital; regulation of public fund raising; duties of directors, officers and promoters; rights of members and minority shareholder protection; forms of corporate insolvency administrations, particularly as they affect creditors, officers and shareholders.
